definitions.title: n. [m.]
definitions.body: nostril (appar. fr. above √, and not connected with Ar.nah.ara stab camel in wind-pipe, etc., Aram. [[נְחַר]] kill by stabbing, in nose or throat, cf. NH [[נׇחַר]] perforate, kill by stabbing, so that [[נׇחִיר]] would = perforation, and [[דהֵוֹנֶחר]] snort wd. be denom.);—only du. sf [[מִנְּחִירָיו]] [[יֵחֵא עָשָׁן]] Job 41:12 (of crocodile).
